successes.title: Lexell Stone Watches: A Stone & Stainless Steel Watch
successes.description: A First of its Kind Stone & Steel Watch! Made With Genuine Stone Bezels/Links cut from Granite, Slate and Quartzite!

Pledges.description: A warm welcome to the Lexell Watches supporting family! We'll give you a big shoutout and personally thank you on our Website's "About Us" page!  Also get added to our "Early Adopters Mailing List" where announcements/deals will be sent first!

A LEATHER LEXELL!  For those of you that love the feel of a nice leather band...this option is for you.  You'll get our amazing one of a kind stone bezel perfectly secured to a genuine leather band. Your choice of stone and face design. (Retail Value of $165)

EARLY BIRD LEXELL! Be part of the lucky group to receive one of the first Lexell watches. Featuring our 100% Genuine Stone Links and Bezel! We are truly thankful for your early support and confidence in us! Your choice of stone and face design. This price also includes a slick leather case. Free shipping within the USA.  (Retail Value of $219)

GOLD & BLACK - Thanks to all of your support we have reached our 3rd stretch goal and are excited to release Gold with Black Granite. This is one of our favorite watches and as a special thank you we are releasing the first 50 at the crazy price of just $99. This price also includes our sleek leather case! Free Shipping within the USA.

LEXELL WHITE LADY: One for the LADIES!! Choose one of the amazing new ladies designs with White Quartzite at the exclusively low price of $99. Better act quick because these are only available at the $99 price for the first 50!! This price also includes our sleek leather case. Free shipping within the USA.

No worries if you missed out on the first offer. The next 150 backers can still get a truly one of a kind Lexell timepiece at basement pricing.  We are extremely grateful for your support!  Your choice of stone and face design. This price also includes a  leather case.   Free shipping within the USA. (Retail Value of $219)

Great savings are still here to be had.  Grab your soon to be favorite watch at an amazing price! Your choice of stone and face design. This price also includes a smooth leather case. Free shipping within the USA. (Retail Value of $219)

Last call! Here is your last chance to take advantage of these KICKSTARTER ONLY  prices.  Don't let this deal get away!!! Up your fashion and your commitment to follow your own path! Choose your stone and face design. (Retail Value of $219)

DUO Deal- One isn't enough? Don't worry we totally understand. Pick any 2 Lexell Stone & Steel watches and worry about which one you're going to wear first, later.  Each watch comes with its own leather case. Free Shipping within the USA.

DUO Deal- One isn't enough? Don't worry we totally understand. Pick any 2 Lexell Stone & Steel watches and worry about which one you're going to wear first, later. Each watch comes with its own leather case. Free Shipping within the USA.

Lexell Addict! - You truly want to stand apart from the crowd!? That will be absolutely no problem by adding 3 of these amazing watches to your collection. Your choice of any 3 Lexell Stone Watches. EACH watch comes with it's own leather case.
